title: OpenAI adds new teen safety rules to ChatGPT as lawmakers weigh AI standards for minors

summary: The hardware world had a brutal week, with iRobot, Luminar, and Rad Power Bikes all filing for bankruptcy.  Each company faces its own mix of tariff pressures, supply chain issues, and shifting markets, but together they tell a larger story about the challenges of building physical products in an era of global trade tensions and […]

title: This Nobel Prize–winning chemist dreams of making water from thin air
summary: Omar Yaghi was a quiet child, diligent, unlikely to roughhouse with his nine siblings. Like most homes in his Palestinian neighborhood in Amman, Jordan, the Yaghis’ had no electricity or running water. At least once…

title: Creating psychological safety in the AI era
summary: Rolling out enterprise-grade AI means climbing two steep cliffs at once. First, understanding and implementing the tech itself.
